mapper.insert: INSERT INTO examine (subject, examineDistinct, room, start_time, end_time, sign_up, max_num) VALUES (#{subject}, #{examineDistinct}, #{room}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{signUp}, #{maxNum})

INSERT INTO examine (subject, examineDistinct, room, start_time, end_time, sign_up, max_num) VALUES
(#{entity.subject},#{entity.examineDistinct},#{entity.room},#{entity.startTime},#{entity.endTime},#{entity.signUp},#{entity.maxNum})
